description:
※This product is also included in a bundle. Please be careful not to make duplicate purchases.

An additional playable scenario, 'Linking Light's Successor #1~#3'.

※The main game (sold separately) is required to use this product.
In addition, please use this item after updating the game in the event that the latest patch is required.
name: Vol.3 Additional Scenario - Linking Light's Successor #1~#3
